<Heading
  as={'h1'}
  className={'openapi__heading'}
  children={'getLintStatus'}
></Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={'get'}
  path={'/api/v1/ai/lint/status'}
  context={'endpoint'}
></MethodEndpoint>

getLintStatus

<ParamsDetails parameters={undefined}></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema title={'Body'} body={undefined}></RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{
    '200': {
      description: 'AI service status',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: {
              enabled: {
                type: 'boolean',
                example: true,
                description: 'Whether AI linting is enabled',
              },
              service: {
                type: 'string',
                example: 'openai',
                description: 'The AI service being used',
              },
            },
            required: ['enabled', 'service'],
            title: 'LintStatus',
          },
        },
      },
    },
  }}
></StatusCodes>
